reviewText: My grandchildren love this movie--not too scary, but just enough to have fun.
Entertaining for children and adults - spooky enough.
It's an awesome movie!

That R.L. Stine dude must be a mega-millionaire... GOOSEBUMPS, etcetera...
This is installment number 3----it's a brand new movie----in MOSTLY GHOSTLY.
The continuing story revolves around two young-adult ghosts trying to get their
parents back from some otherworldly misty-area between heaven and Earth. I
guess there are better flicks out there, but I am a 67-year-old COMPLETIST that
began buying the R.L.Stine films since my 25-year-old niece---seen with me in
an attached pic---was a little kid.
BTW: We BOTH love Hallowe'en, and always spend Hallowe'en at Frankenstein
Castle ruins... down the road from my German farm. ( I've seen better sequels. )
Although I have not bought this yet I have watched and it is excellent. The funny thing I see here is that it has been dated 1916 , lol. They were really turning out some good DVDs back then.
lousy
Great preteen spooky movie! My 8 & 10 year old loved it!

Good movie for all ages has humor and very mild spooks. This is the 3rd mostly ghostly it isn't as good as the first one. The second one wasn't great either but we still enjoyed them enough to watch them a few times like this one. If you love RL Stine go for it but if you haven't seen any of his other shows or movies I'd pick a different one
Pretty funny and good for kids to see.
Very Happy with shipping time and DVD
I like all of R.L. Stine's movies.  Funny, not  scary and evil like most ghost movies today.

My daughter and I love this series. The third installment is just as great as the other two, even though the cast has changed in all three of the movies. I am really hoping that there will be more of this series in the future.
